basic.description:
The lands and peoples of Mexico, Central America, and the West Indies, emphasizing the historical factors that shape contemporary life in the region.
NOTE    Course audio-visual supplies: $10.
basic.subject: GPHY
basic.title: The Geography of Middle America

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of GPHY101 or GPHY102 or Level 2 in a DEVS plan or permission of the department.
